name: Growers
description:
Growers is a chaotic platformer multiplayer PvP game in which players compete with each other to reach the light on a dark map, to transform into a monster and devour the others. The game has full 4 controller support and is local multiplayer.

Stages


The game has several maps across different scenarios, such as icy caves, ancient temples and outer space, each one with its peculiarities and traps that will contribute to the chaotic tone of the game. It maybe the wind( i hate the wind ), the slippery floor or the water on the stage that will help or keep you from satisfying your hunger

Gamemodes


There are different modes to be played, making each game unique:

  • Normal, which is the standard experience. Reach the light and eat your friends
  • Survival, one player is the monster in each round and has to fight the clock to eat everyone before the time is over
  • Make your Teams and play all against one friend, or make a 2v2. You choose the team size and members
  • In the Deathmatch the whole scenario is on fire, don't get carbonized

All of them with customizable variables,so it matches your taste

Traps


The most useful and stressful traps are found in all the stages. You can push your friends to the fire platforms so they lose control or jump in a fluffy mushroom to reach the light

Characters


You have various characters to choose from: From the reeeaally sad Tixte to Nana, the craziest banana you've ever seen( i hope ). Each one with its own personality, but they all have the same status and hunger
